data.title: List of Polydor Records artists
data.meta_description: This is a list of artists that are currently, or once were, signed to Polydor Records. NOTOC 0 9* 2Pac (Polydor UK) * 3 D * 4 Runner (Polydor Nashville) * +44 (Polydor UK) * 50 Cent (Polydor UK)A* a ha * ABBA (worldwide since 1992) * Alizée *…
data.text:
